overview:
Profile Technology was founded in the UK by entrepreneur and software developer Chris Claydon to develop popular and useful social network applications for a range of platforms including Facebook, Orkut, mySpace and Hi5.

Profile Technology rapidly grew to become the largest social application developer in Europe, before relocating to New Zealand.

Profile Technology’s flagship product is The Profile Engine

http://profileengine.com

The Profile Engine began as the world’s largest, fastest and most flexible independent search engine for Facebook. It includes a searchable database of over 450 Million Facebook users, pages, groups and applications. It has now expanded to become a fully-fledged social network offering unlimited free music videos. Offering the most powerful search tools of any social network it is ideal for meeting new people and for dating, as well as tracking down old friends you’ve lost contact with.

The most popular Profile Technology application is the original IQ Test. This was the world’s first social network IQ test and has spawned many imitations. Professionally translated into Spanish, Portuguese and Russian the test has been taken by 25 Million people on six social network platforms.
